scripts.test:chrome: BROWSER_NAME=chrome npx wdio run wdio.conf.js --parallel=true 2>&1 | tee ./terminal_log.txt

scripts.test:edge: BROWSER_NAME=MicrosoftEdge npx wdio run wdio.conf.js --parallel=true 2>&1 | tee ./terminal_log.txt
scripts.test:firefoxxx: BROWSER_NAME=firefox npx wdio run wdio.conf-xx.js --parallel=false 2>&1 | tee ./terminal_log.txt
scripts.test:edgexx: BROWSER_NAME=MicrosoftEdge npx wdio run wdio.conf-xx.js --parallel=false 2>&1 | tee ./terminal_log.txt
